KPN are the Dutch national telecommunications provider, and KPN Mobiel is the division of KPN which handles mobile telephony. Perot Systems had an alliance with a software delivery department of KPN and were looking to consolidate this relationship with a view to a possible future joint venture partnership.
This assignment was as a direct result of the pre-sales proposal which I had been involved in immediately prior to this assignment.
The overall programme of work was to implement systems which would provide KPN Mobiel with a much better view of, and a much closer relationship with, its customers.
I was asked to project manage a 'proof of viability' project to establish for senior KPN Mobiel management that the solution which had been proposed by KPN's internal architecture group, could actually be made to work.
The project team consisted of ten experienced software developers from within Perot Systems, from KPN Mobiel, and from a third party company who were providing the applications development tools. The project ran for three months, and successfully delivered a system which demonstrated viability to senior KPN management and which then allowed the overall programme to receive funding.
